mapper.update:
update SFV_FILE
SFV04 = #{sfv04,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SFV05 = #{sfv05,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where SFV01 = #{sfv01,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and SFV03 = #{sfv03,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select sfv03, sfv17, sfv11, sfv04, ima02,sfv08, sfv05,imd02, sfv09 from ${centre}.sfv_file left join ${centre}.IMA_FILE on ima01 = sfv04 left join ${centre}.IMD_FILE on imd01 = sfv05 where sfv01 = #{code}
